item.description:
This evening we have a combination IN PERSON/ BY PHONE Meetup for
BostonLOA members interested in participating in our Master Key System Study Group.

From 7 - 9 pm, we gather at Dave's loft.

Go to following link to get details & RSVP:
http://lawofattractio...

From 9 - 10 pm, transition to discussing Lesson 9 on the PHONE.
This is to include folks who can only participate via the phone.

** Please take the time to read Lesson 9, do the activities and
be ready to discuss & share.


We have established a Yahoo! group for our Master Key System Study
Group. Please join this group to participate. You'll have access to the
lesson materials, telephone bridge # and forum.

http://groups.yahoo.c...

( When joining our Yahoo Group, pliz enter your NAME in your profile. )

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA Master Key Study Group - BY PHONE
